subSubSection.paragraph:
Cryphalus takahashii Johnson
nom. nov.
[
Ernoporus
]

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
=
Euptilius exiguus Browne, 1984c: 451
syn. nov.
(secondary homonym).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Remarks: A replacement name is proposed for
Euptilius exiguus Browne, 1984c
because the name is occupied by
Cryphalus exiguus Blandford, 1894b
. The replacement name is a noun in the genitive case, honoring the original collector, K. Takahashi.
